tool_description: Evaluates vendor capabilities against specific technical, operational, and service delivery requirements.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor to assess

capacity_requirements.description: Required capacity or scale of operations

assessment_depth.description: Assessment detail level: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist in the database
Invalid assessment depth: Must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
Insufficient requirement details: Technical and service level requirements must be clearly specified
Assessment data unavailable: Unable to retrieve capability information for this vendor
usage: Provide vendor_id with detailed technical_requirements, service_level_requirements, and capacity_requirements. Set assessment_depth based on evaluation needs.

capacity_adequacy.description: Assessment of capacity adequacy: insufficient, adequate, or excellent

capability_gaps.description: List of identified capability gaps or weaknesses
